lines.text: The ends justify the means, Pops.
The ends is bullshit. The means is what you live with.
You know Chinese don't trust whites or cops, and you send me a white cop?
Beef intestine noodle?
Uh, no.
You wanna be Chinese, you gotta eat the gross stuff.
You don't change Chinatown, it changes you.
How do I know I can trust YOU?
You don't.
Beef intestine noodles, want some?
Uh, no.
You wanna be a Chinese, you gotta eat the nasty stuff.
Black or red plum?
Nah, I don't like plums.
What do you mean you don't like plums?
I like peaches.
Peaches is shit. Haven't you ever heard the song Sinatra sang? 'Out of the tree of life I just picked me a plum.' Not a peach, a plum.
I don't care if he pulled a raisin out of Sammy Davis's eye-socket, I prefer peaches.
Do it wrong... and I go out of my way to bury you!

You never know how a guy gettin' his dick rubbed is gonna react when you charge the room, so keep your eyes sharp and your Glock cocked. And don't be tryin' to feel any Chinese titties either, ya little pervert!
You are not man enough to kill me.
[puts gun in mouth and pulls trigger]
No, but we kill you anyway Uncle Benny!
[shoots body excessively with the gang]

[while watching TV 'Uncle' Benny hears gunshots outside and pulls a revolver out of draw just as Bobby and his hit squad kick open his door]
Uncle Benny

[defiant last lines]
You think you can kill me?
[shoots himself]
We kill you anyway
[fires gun into Benny's body while screaming along with the others]
UNCLE BENNY! UNCLE BENNY! UNCLE BENNY!

[to his son]
Got a drink? I'm drier than a ninety-year-old tit.
